Honor dispensed sweets to his fans for Halloween: here is the first clue on his new smartwatch
It should arrive later this year and the most accredited name would be Honor Watch Magic 2.
02 Nov 2019, 11:18 by Edoardo Carlo Ceretti
In mid-September, together with the new and controversial Mate 30, Huawei also presented Watch GT 2, a new smartwatch that we have already had the opportunity to review and appreciate for its construction, functionality and above all autonomy. Soon, even the twin brand Honor will follow the example, as he clearly made clear on the occasion of Halloween night.
Through his social channels, in fact, Honor wanted to tease his fans by publishing a Halloween-themed image, featuring the silhouette of a mysterious smartwatch, which closely resembles that Watch Magic he presented at the end of 2018. by itself do 2 + 2 and assume that Watch Magic 2 is on the launching pad by the end of this 2019.
However, more detailed information is not available on his account. Surely it will be a smartwatch with a circular display, presumably in AMOLED technology, with two prominent physical keys on the right side, and it is likely that the list price will be aggressive. Who knows also if, following in the footsteps of Watch GT 2, it will come in two dimensional variants, from 46 and 42 mm, to better adapt to any wrist. Soon we will hear about it again.
